definitions: the reduction or underestimation of the worth or importance of something

examples.text: the general devaluation of expertise in our culture
his philosophical views led to a devaluation of the individual

shortDefinitions: reduction or underestimation of worth or importance of thing

definitions: the reduction in the official value of a currency in relation to other currencies

examples.text: a financial crisis will result in severe devaluation of the country's currency
the pound has suffered a devaluation

shortDefinitions: reduction in official value of currency in relation to other currencies
